name: XMLImportMaps
shortdesc: A collection of XML import maps.

parameters.name: markupTag
parameters.shortdesc: The tag to map. Can accept: XMLTag or String.

parameters.name: mappedStyle
parameters.shortdesc: the mapped style. Can accept: ParagraphStyle, CharacterStyle, TableStyle, CellStyle or String.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new XMLImportMap

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the XMLImportMap.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLImportMap with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLImportMaps within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLImportMap, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: XMLImportMap, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLImportMap, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: XMLImportMap, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first XMLImportMap in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last XMLImportMap in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle XMLImportMap in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLImportMap with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the XMLImportMap that follows the desired XMLImportMap.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLImportMap whose index follows the specified XMLImportMap in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLImportMap whose index comes before the desired XMLImportMap.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any XMLImportMap in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every XMLImportMap in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLImportMap.
Returns the XMLImportMap with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
